title: Rubber Space Academy
description: RUBBER SPACE ACADEMY IS NOW AVAILABLE ONLY INNAUGHTY TALES OF LEATHER AND LATEXSpace cadet Pamela Blamm is in trouble. Unauthorized sex toys have been found in her footlocker at the highly repressed Titus Bysshe Women's Space Academy, and it looks like she will be disciplined. But Pamela's encounter with the rubber skirted CO takes a bizarre turn and leads to a series of erotic and comical escapades with latex clad women of the academy. Will Pamela be able to escape?
author: Roxy Katt
